Trusted

We have worked with over eleven EPCs, and are being awarded successive projects from most of those EPC's and their Clients, after our first project together.

Demanded

We are one of the busiest company in the industry; since our foundation we had at least one active project at any given time, and we have erected more Gas Turbines, Steam Turbines, and HRSGs than any other company in Turkey.

Experienced

Most of our workforce has been with us since our founding, and have worked with numerious projects

Previous Next

Who We Are?

Mastır Enerji is specialized in Power Plant equipment manufacturing and erection, and construction works. The company was established in 2001 by a team of engineers and technicians with over 30 years of experience, and since then completed numerous projects for the biggest power plants in Turkey. To date we have erected numerious HRSGs, Gas Turbines, and Steam Turbines with outputs ranging up to 65MW.

HRSG

More than 35 units of various types of Heat Recovery Steam Generators (HRSG).

Gas Turbines

More than 25 units of Gas Turbines from various makers.

Steam Turbines

More than 25 units of Steam Turbines from various makers.

Balance of Plant

Thousands of kilometers length of piping with thousands of tons steel installation, along with auxilliary equipment.

Ongoing / Recent Projects

Tupras / Kırıkkale

Modernization Works of the old Power Plant located within Tupras Refinery with a New Cogeneration Power Plant using new, safer and more efficient technologies.

Project Details »

Tupras / Kırıkkale

Electromechanical Installation works of one Aalborg SteamGen™ 4 Package boiler and one SteamGen™ 6 HRSG with supplementary and fresh air firing for the Kirikkale Refinery 80 km outside Ankara, Turkey. (ASME and EN Standards are followed together)

Project Details »

Kayalı Enerji / Osmaniye

  • Mechanical Installation of Nooter/Eriksen HRSG with Bypass Stack
  • Mechanical Installation of 60 MW Siemens Trend60 Gas Turbine
  • Mechanical Installation of 15.7 MW Siemens Steam Turbine
  • Installation of BoP piping (incl. auxilliary equipment)

Project Details »

Eti Bakır A.Ş / Mardin

Mazidagi Phospate Plant

Air Cooled Condenser and Steam Turbine Installation

  • 32MW Doosan Skoda Steam Turbine Installation with Piping
  • 8 Fan Spig Air Cooled Condenser Installation

Project Details »

Modern Karton / Çorlu

"1 X 240 TPH, Single Drum, Water Tube, Continous Fluidized Bed Combustion Coal Boiler Project Equipment Installation".

  • Bag Filter
  • Coal Handling Unit
  • Ash Handling Unit
  • Fans
  • Flue Gas Heat Exchanger
  • 1600 tons steel structure erection
  • Electrical and Instrumentation Works
  • Refractory Works
  • Insulation Works
  • 72 meter Steel Stack with borosilicate application
